languages.text: Абордажные группы из экипажа благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана обрушились на головы повстанцев в десантных челноках. К сожалению, не все пилоты были достаточно умелы — часть групп высадилась не там, где должна была, либо же они прибывали на планету с запозданием. Маневр, задуманный как молниеносный и рассекающий группировку боевиков на изолированные отряды, превратился в ловушку для блюстителей почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана. Зажатые в огневых мешках, они заняли круговую оборону и несли серьезные потери.

traits.locale_text: Абордажные группы из экипажа благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана обрушились на головы повстанцев в десантных челноках. К сожалению, не все пилоты были достаточно умелы — часть групп высадилась не там, где должна была, либо же они прибывали на планету с запозданием. Маневр, задуманный как молниеносный и рассекающий группировку боевиков на изолированные отряды, превратился в ловушку для солдат почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана. Зажатые в огневых мешках, они заняли круговую оборону и несли серьезные потери.

languages.text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.
languages.original_text: Абордажные группы из экипажа благословенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана обрушились на головы повстанцев в десантных челноках. К сожалению, не все пилоты были достаточно умелы — часть групп высадилась не там, где должна была, либо же они прибывали на планету с запозданием. Маневр, задуманный как молниеносный и рассекающий группировку боевиков на изолированные отряды, превратился в ловушку для блюстителей почтенно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана. Зажатые в огневых мешках, они заняли круговую оборону и несли серьезные потери.

traits.locale_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's soldiers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's soldiers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's soldiers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

languages.text: 祝福受けしロード・キャプテンの乗組員から加わった一行は、着陸用シャトルで反乱軍の頭上から襲撃を実行した。残念ながら技能不足のパイロットがいたために、乗務員の一部グループは着陸地点を誤ったり、惑星地表への到着が遅れたりした。反乱軍の孤立集団に迅速かつ決定的な打撃を与える目的で施していた訓練が、尊敬捧げられしロード・キャプテンの実行部隊にとって致命的な罠に一変した。円状の防御陣形をとっていた部隊は火に囲まれ、大敗を喫した。
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: 祝福受けしロード・キャプテンの乗組員から加わった一行は、着陸用シャトルで反乱軍の頭上から襲撃を実行した。残念ながら技能不足のパイロットがいたために、乗務員の一部グループは着陸地点を誤ったり、惑星地表への到着が遅れたりした。反乱軍の孤立集団に迅速かつ決定的な打撃を与える目的で施していた訓練が、尊敬捧げられしロード・キャプテンの実行部隊にとって致命的な罠に一変した。円状の防御陣形をとっていた部隊は火に囲まれ、大敗を喫した。

languages.text: 神皇保佑的舰长大人带领的陆战队，乘坐着登陆穿梭机，从叛军的头顶袭来。遗憾的是，部分飞行员技术不够娴熟，部分陆战队员要么降落在了错误的地方，要么过了很久才抵达行星表面。这次行动原本打算对孤立的叛军进行迅速果断的打击，结果却让德高望重的舰长大人手下的执法者落入了致的命陷阱。落入火力包围圈的战士们采取了环形防御队形，但依然损失惨重。
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: 神皇保佑的舰长大人带领的陆战队，乘坐着登陆穿梭机，从叛军的头顶袭来。遗憾的是，部分飞行员技术不够娴熟，部分陆战队员要么降落在了错误的地方，要么过了很久才抵达行星表面。这次行动原本打算对孤立的叛军进行迅速果断的打击，结果却让德高望重的舰长大人手下的镇压者落入了致的命陷阱。落入火力包围圈的战士们采取了环形防御队形，但依然损失惨重。

languages.text: Los grupos de abordaje de la tripulación {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} descendieron sobre los rebeldes en sus naves de desembarco. Por desgracia, algunos pilotos eran menos hábiles que otros, y varias unidades se desplegaron en el lugar equivocado o alcanzaron la superficie planetaria a destiempo. La maniobra, que había sido planificada como una ofensiva rápida y decisiva contra grupos aislados de rebeldes, se convirtió en una trampa mortal para las fuerzas {mf|del estimado Lord Capitán|de la estimada Lord Capitán}. Atrapados en el fuego cruzado, adoptaron una formación defensiva en círculo y sufrieron numerosas bajas.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: Los grupos de abordaje de la tripulación {mf|del bendito Lord Capitán|de la bendita Lord Capitán} descendieron sobre los rebeldes en sus naves de desembarco. Por desgracia, algunos pilotos eran menos hábiles que otros, y varias unidades se desplegaron en el lugar equivocado o alcanzaron la superficie planetaria a destiempo. La maniobra, que había sido planificada como una ofensiva rápida y decisiva contra grupos aislados de rebeldes, se convirtió en una trampa mortal para las fuerzas {mf|del estimado Lord Capitán|de la estimada Lord Capitán}. Atrapados en el fuego cruzado, adoptaron una formación defensiva en círculo y sufrieron numerosas bajas.

languages.text: Die Landetrupps der Crew des gesegneten Lord Captain fielen in ihren Landeshuttles von oben über die Rebellen her. Leider waren einige Piloten weniger geschickt als andere, und einige Landetrupps landeten an der falschen Stelle oder schlichtweg zu spät auf der Planetenoberfläche. Die Übung, die als rascher und gründlicher Schlag gegen isolierte Rebellengruppe geplant gewesen war, entwickelte sich zu einer tödlichen Falle für die Enforcers des geschätzten Lord Captain. Sie gerieten unter konzentrierten Beschuss, bildeten eine kreisförmige Verteidigungsstellung und erlitten schwere Verluste.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: Die Landetrupps der Crew des gesegneten Lord Captain fielen in ihren Landeshuttles von oben über die Rebellen her. Leider waren einige Piloten weniger geschickt als andere, und einige Landetrupps landeten an der falschen Stelle oder schlichtweg zu spät auf der Planetenoberfläche. Die Übung, die als rascher und gründlicher Schlag gegen isolierte Rebellengruppe geplant gewesen war, entwickelte sich zu einer tödlichen Falle für die Enforcers des geschätzten Lord Captain. Sie gerieten unter konzentrierten Beschuss, bildeten eine kreisförmige Verteidigungsstellung und erlitten schwere Verluste.

languages.text: Les membres choisis de l'équipage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} embarquèrent dans leurs navettes pour partir à l'assaut des rebelles. Malheureusement, certains pilotes étaient moins doués que d'autres : une partie des groupes d'abordage n'atterrirent pas au bon endroit ou firent une arrivée tardive à la surface de la planète. Alors que, sur le papier, l'opération devait être une frappe rapide et décisive sur des groupes isolés de rebelles, elle se transforma en piège mortel pour les prévôts de l'honorable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Pris sous des tirs nourris, ils adoptèrent une formation défensive circulaire et essuyèrent de lourdes pertes.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.

traits.locale_text: Les membres choisis de l'équipage {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} embarquèrent dans leurs navettes pour partir à l'assaut des rebelles. Malheureusement, certains pilotes étaient moins doués que d'autres : une partie des groupes d'abordage n'atterrirent pas au bon endroit ou firent une arrivée tardive à la surface de la planète. Alors que, sur le papier, l'opération devait être une frappe rapide et décisive sur des groupes isolés de rebelles, elle se transforma en piège mortel pour les prévôts de l'honorable {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Pris sous des tirs nourris, ils adoptèrent une formation défensive circulaire et essuyèrent de lourdes pertes.

languages.text: Yüce Lord Kaptan'ın mürettebatına mensup baskın ekipleri, isyancıların tam üzerine indi. Ne yazık ki bazı pilotlar diğerlerine nazaran daha acemi olduğundan kimi ekipler yanlış yere konumlandı, kimileri de iniş yapmakta geç kaldı. Köşeye sıkışmış isyancı gruplarına karşı ani bir darbe olarak planlanan saldırı girişimi, muhterem Lord Kaptan'ın infazcıları için ölümcül bir tuzağa dönüştü. Çapraz ateş arasında kalan birlikler, dairesel bir savunma formasyon oluştursa da ağır kayıplar verdi.
languages.original_text: The boarding parties from the blessed Lord Captain's crew descended upon the heads of the rebels in their landing shuttles. Unfortunately, some pilots were less skilled than others and some of the boarding parties landed in the wrong place, or arrived late on the planet's surface. The exercise, which had been planned as a swift and decisive strike against isolated groups of rebels, turned into a deadly trap for the esteemed Lord Captain's enforcers. Caught in pockets of fire, they assumed a circular defensive formation and sustained heavy losses.
